summary.para: Contains information about the audio and video streams for the transcode sink activation object.
To get the information stored in this structure, call .

member.name: MF_TRANSCODE_SINK_INFO.dwVideoStreamID
member.summary: The stream identifier of the video stream.

member.name: MF_TRANSCODE_SINK_INFO.pVideoMediaType
member.summary: A pointer to the interface of the media type for the video stream. This member can be NULL.

member.name: MF_TRANSCODE_SINK_INFO.dwAudioStreamID
member.summary: The stream identifier of the audio stream.

member.name: MF_TRANSCODE_SINK_INFO.pAudioMediaType
member.summary: A pointer to the interface of the media type for the audio stream. This member can be NULL.
